sys_ui_message.key: Deleting the records will permanently remove the association with the associated benefit plan(s). It also results in the automatic deletion of the following related records.
sys_ui_message.message: При видаленні записів зв'язок із пов'язаними планами пільг буде безповоротно видалено. Також будуть автоматично видалені наступні пов'язані записи.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Deleting the records will permanently remove the association with the associated benefit plan(s). It also results in the automatic deletion of the following related records.
